metadata.title: CVE-2018-12097 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The liblnk_location_information_read_data function inliblnk_location_information.c in liblnk through 2018-04-19 allows remoteattackers to cause an information disclosure (heap-based buffer over-read)via a crafted lnk file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inlibyal/liblnk issue 33 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
